description: This module will offer special topics which may change from semester to semester. Students should check the topics on offer in a given semester before enrolling in the module.
title: Topics in Political Science
prerequisite:
Nil for the ‘parent’ module. Particular topics may
have pre‐requisites appropriate to their content.
For example, the first proposed topic with be
PS3880A Modern Chinese Political Thought,
which will have as a pre‐requisite PS2253 Chinese
Political Thought (which focuses on the ancient
Chinese classics).
